thread.title: Oscars: The Hidden Figures Cast Will Make You Say "Damn, Girls!"
thread.title_full: Oscars: The Hidden Figures Cast Will Make You Say "Damn, Girls!"

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Oscars: The Hidden Figures Cast Will Make You Say "Damn, Girls!"
text:
Hidden Figures Cast at the 2017 Oscars Oscars: The Hidden Figures Cast Will Make You Say "Damn, Girls!" February 26, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Oscars: The Hidden Figures Cast Will Make You Say "Damn, Girls!" 
The Hidden Figures cast came to win at the Oscars on Sunday. Taraji P. Henson stunned on the red carpet, as did costars Janelle Monáe and Octavia Spencer — who is nominated for best supporting actress . Even if they don't take home best picture ( competition is stiff this year ), the cast wins in our hearts for being so damn confident and stunning. Even the men looked gorgeous! Then again, how could new dad Mahershala Ali not look good?
